attributes.action: Stop travel companies charging inflated prices in school holidays
attributes.additional_details: Google holidays beginning October 10th £259, week commencing October 17th £499, week commencing October 24th (half term) £1349, this is scandalous, and must be regulated by law. The government has to take a stand as millions of families are being subjected to these fraudulently inflated prices on a regular basis throughout the year.
attributes.background: The average weeks holiday pre/post school holiday times is 5 times cheaper than the same week during school holiday times, isn't it any wonder that parents are not only prepared to pay school fines for taking children out of school, but find in the cheaper option
